conductor.tip.garage: Drag wagons to add them to the train. Press depart when you are ready!
conductor.tip.map: Select start and end stations. Watch fuel cost carefully!
conductor.tip.station_first: Drag passengers to the correct wagon. Blue passengers board economy wagons.
conductor.intro.1: Welcome Engineer! I am your conductor uncle. I will help you.
conductor.intro.2: Welcome Engineer! Your grandfather left you an old locomotive.
conductor.intro.3: This is 'Black Smoke' - coal-powered, old but loyal.
conductor.intro.4: Let's depart for your first trip! Prepare your train in the garage.
conductor.tip.passenger_lost: Oops, we lost a passenger! Move faster, Engineer!
conductor.tip.fuel_empty: Fuel is running out! Speed dropped, let's refuel at the next station!
conductor.tip.fuel_low: Fuel is low, let's refill at the next station!

garage.upgrade.title: UPGRADES

garage.upgrade.reason.line: Complete the full line once to unlock this level.

First click = start (green)
Second click = end (red)

event.evt_motor.description: The engine is struggling, this segment will be slower.
event.evt_door.title: Door Failure
event.evt_door.description: Door system is jammed, station time is shorter.
event.evt_vip.title: Surprise VIP
event.evt_sick.title: Sick Passenger
event.evt_sick.description: A passenger feels unwell, we should help.
event.evt_fuel_hike.title: Fuel Price Hike
event.evt_fuel_hike.description: Fuel price increased for this trip.
event.evt_festival.title: Festival Crowd

menu.slot.confirm_overwrite: Click again: existing save will be deleted.
conductor.tip.slow_mode: Slow mode is active - play at your own pace!
tutorial.step.1: Drag one wagon into the train.
tutorial.step.2: Pick two stops on the map to plan a short trip.
tutorial.step.3: Drop the first passenger into a matching wagon.
tutorial.step.4: Watch the timer and keep passengers moving.
tutorial.step.5: You can change speed with the 2x button during travel.
tutorial.step.6: You can review your trip result on this panel.
tutorial.trip2.garage: Try a longer route this time! Keep an eye on fuel.
tutorial.trip2.fuel_low: Fuel is getting low! Press the 'Refuel' button.
tutorial.trip2.cargo: Cargo gives extra income. If you have a cargo wagon, press 'Load'.
